about.title: ABOUT ME
about.heading: More than code, I create experiences that connect.

paragraphs.first: Systems Engineer with over four years of experience in frontend development and fullstack focus, specialized in creating scalable and high-performance web and mobile applications. I work primarily with React, Next.js and React Native, and have participated in backend projects with Node.js and Python using different frameworks. I thrive in agile environments, collaborating with multidisciplinary teams, with a strong focus on user experience and clear communication in professional English.
paragraphs.second: Born and raised in the Caribbean, an influence that is reflected in the passion I bring to each project. I combine the structured logic of backend with the creativity of frontend to build balanced digital products, where functionality, performance and aesthetics work together.
